mobiles.name: oldstyle fairy dragon
mobiles.long_description: A fairy dragon is fluttering around here looking for something to do...
mobiles.description:
It's a cute little multi-colored dragon...about 2 foot long.
It gracefully dances around your head.

mobiles.name: oldstyle griffin
mobiles.long_description: A large black winged griffin swoops into an attack.
mobiles.description:
Golden maned and black all over.  It's quite a beautiful creature if not
for the fact it is hungry and is attacking you!

objects.name: rose
objects.description: A red rose is lying on the ground.

extra_descriptions.description: It's a beautiful red rose, with a soft and romantic fragrance.

rooms.name: In the air ...

You are flying!
Currently you are about 40 meters above the ground north of the city.
It seems like you can see forever!
